name: trclsslem
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0))))), cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)))))))

stmt.origin: clsslem(s0, c0, c1, wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0))))), cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)))))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0))))), cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)))))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: The transitive closure (as a relation) of a subclass is a subclass of the transitive closure. (Contributed by RP, 3-May-2020.)
